post.author: BNA!
post.body:
Dear all,

we're working hard in the background to update the server.

I don't want to lie to you - things will go wrong and you will see anomalies and eventually you'll experience some downtime here and there over the course of the next two weeks.

So don't worry we're not getting hacked, we're messing things up ourselves.

Sorry for any inconvenience.
